overview: Pete's first ever DVD, 'Passing Time', is a 100-minute long testament to one of most promising singer/songwriters to emerge in local music in recent times and jam-packed with all the features you could want from a music DVD: a 60-minute, five-camera live recording of Pete's recent show at The Metro Theatre in Sydney; intimate, in-studio footage of the making of the album 'Feeler'; on the road footage of Pete and the band from the 'Feel' tour and Pete's three video clips for 'Feeler', 'Lines' and 'So Beautiful'.
title: Pete Murray: Passing Time
